dialogue.annotation: I initially thought the <aspect_05> price point </aspect_05> was <opinion_05> too high </opinion_05>, but <rationale_05> with the features, it seems justifiable now </rationale_05>.

dialogue.utterance: Even with the high price, the value for performance is unparalleled, especially in this segment.
